author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Dave plays in the BIGGEST Warhammer game the world has ever seen! Over 10,000 miniatures were used; it took 6 players over 200 hours over 5 days to compete in this never-before-seen spectacle! This video shows the setup and the stakes of this massive tabletop experience. 

Experience Round 1 of this game here: https://youtu.be/Sr8ZuqaqiKI
Vault Members Watch Here:  https://www.miniwargaming.com/content/round-1-300-000-point-warhammer-40k-apocalypse-game-orks-vs-chaos

Miniatures:
Sponsored by Wayland Games
Get Chaos Space Marines here: https://www.waylandgames.co.uk/
Get Broozers (Ork Proxies) here: https://geargutsmekshop.com/

Players:

Rob - https://www.instagram.com/thing.a.ma.rob
